Anna Mikhaylovna looked at- tentively at the sick man's eyes, trying to guess what he wanted; she pointed first to Pierre, then to some drink, then named Prince Vasfli in an inquiring whisper, then pointed to the quilt. The eyes and face of the sick man showed im- patience. He made an effort to look at the serv- ant who stood constantly at the head of the bed.
